summary.span: 將 ASP.NET 網頁檢視狀態儲存在 Web 伺服器上。

span.span: Stores ASP.NET page view state on the Web server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 網頁可以儲存狀態之間原本是無狀態的 HTTP 要求和回應的處理，並提供任何網頁所需的資訊。ASP.NET pages can store state information between the inherently stateless HTTP request and response required to process and serve any Web page. 此狀態稱為 「 檢視狀態 」。This state is called "view state." 預設的 ASP.NET 持續性機制是將檢視狀態儲存在用戶端使用類別。The default ASP.NET persistence mechanism is to store view state on the client using the class. 儲存檢視狀態和資料與每個 HTTP 要求和回應中表現良好一般，而且是大型的 Web 伺服陣列案例中很重要，因為它並不重要的 Web 伺服器要求提供服務： 頁面狀態是可在目前的內容伺服器精確地呈現頁面。Storing view state and data with each HTTP request and response performs well in general and is important in large Web farm scenarios because it does not matter which Web server services the request: the page state is available in the current context for the server to accurately render the page. 會對用戶端的資源有限，或使用不支援隱藏的欄位元素的標記語言的小型裝置提供服務網頁的情況下，它都必須儲存在伺服器上檢視狀態。In scenarios where pages are served to small devices that have limited client-side resources or use a markup language that does not support a hidden field element, it is required to store view state on the server. 數個 ASP.NET 裝置頁面配接器會覆寫`GetStatePersister`方法以傳回用戶端相關聯的工作階段物件中的伺服器儲存的頁面狀態的物件。Several ASP.NET device page adapters override the `GetStatePersister` method to return a object that stores page state on the server in the session object associated with the client. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何撰寫類別，以傳回的執行個體類別，而不使用預設類別來儲存伺服器端工作階段物件的檢視狀態。The following code example demonstrates how you can write a class to return an instance of the class instead of the default class to save view state to the server-side session object.
